title: ECRAB Wii Remote Controller (2 Pack) with Motion Plus Compatible with Wii and Wii U Console Wii Remote Controller with Shock Function (Red+Blue)
features: This Wii Controller Compatible with Nintendo Wii and Wii U . Please note It is manufactured by a third party, not original.
With motion sensor wii remote can judge the movement and tilt, make the movements of the player's arms, wrists and hands truly reflected in the game. Achieve unprecedented precision and ease of use.
Wireless Bluetooth connection with controlling distance up to 5m. Connect to the console simply by pressing the SYNC button. Powered by 2 AA batteries (batteries not included).
Wii remote with shock function and Built-in speaker. Powerful speaker provides instant audio feedback. It can greatly enhance the immersive feeling.
If any problems with your purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us, We will spare no efforts to help fix your problem.
description: Step 1: Open your Wii console, insert 2 AA batteries (not included) into the wii remote then turn on remote;Step 2: Press SYNC button in the remote controller;Step 3: Press the red button in the wii console in a short time. Connection is successful when only 1 light are on (press "reset" in wii console if 4 lights do not stop flashing, repeat steps 2 and 3).
❤If the connection is lost, please check:

1. If the battery voltage is below 2.3V, the connection may be broken. Please change to new batteries;2. The batteries could be loose; 3. Please do not place the controller too close or too far from the Wii host. Keep the distance within 196 inchs.4. You can try holding down the red button on the back of the controller (SYNC button) and the SYNC button on the Wii console once again.
Low-power instructions: The connection indicator flashes quickly.Please replace the new batteries in time when the low voltage alarm occurs.
Cable length: 39.3 inchesRemote size: 5.7 x 1.3 x 1.1 inches Bluetooth control distance: about 196 inches
1 x Red wii remote (without battery)1 x Blue wii remote (without battery)2 x White silicone case for remote1 x Red wirst strap1 x Blue wirst strap
